item.title: Here’s why Ozempic maker’s new weight-loss drug isn’t good enough for investors
item.description: New trial data showed CagriSema led to “superior” weight loss, but at a rate much less than original expectations of 25%.

item.title: There’s a Fed put and a Trump put — but don’t forget the C-suite put, as well
item.description: Companies may put a floor under stocks by switching to buybacks from capital expenditure, according to Citi strategists.

item.title: One of Wall Street’s biggest bulls now says a flash crash can’t be ruled out
item.description: Ed Yardeni says a bear market for stocks may already be underway, and a “flash crash” can’t be ruled out.

item.title: European stocks have crushed the U.S. — now a big bank is shifting its view
item.description: The year has started with a big rally for European stocks as the U.S. market struggles to remain above water. Now, HSBC strategists are changing their...

item.title: Nvidia’s stock is cheap by this metric. Can next week’s GTC get it going again?
item.description: Nvidia hosts its annual conference next week at a time when investors have soured on AI stocks.
